program_finder.description: Conversational Program Finder for TU Berlin with questions, verified facts, and up to three suggestions.

questions.en: Which degree level are you interested in: Bachelor or Master?
questions.de: Welches Abschlussniveau interessiert Sie: Bachelor oder Master?

questions.en: Which language of instruction do you prefer or require? (German, English, or either)
questions.de: Welche Unterrichtssprache bevorzugen oder benötigen Sie? (Deutsch, Englisch oder egal)

language_constraint.notes: Do not assume language knowledge; always ask explicitly.

questions.en: What field or interests should the program fit? (e.g., computer science, architecture, sustainability, data, design)
questions.de: Welches Fachgebiet oder welche Interessen sollen zum Studiengang passen? (z. B. Informatik, Architektur, Nachhaltigkeit, Daten, Design)

title.action: Extract the value of the key `title`.

degree.action: Extract the value of the key `Degree` inside `sections.headings.tables.rows`.

duration.action: Extract the value of the key `Standard period of study` inside `sections.headings.tables.rows`.

language.action: Extract the value of the key `Language of instruction` inside `sections.headings.tables.rows`.

admission.action: Extract the value of the key `Admission` inside `sections.headings.tables.rows`.

url.action: Extract the value of the key `url`.

program_overview.action: Summarize the factual information from `paragraphs` that follow directly under `sections` by the key: `paragraphs`.

acquired_skills.action: Summarize the factual information from `paragraphs` that follow directly under `sections.headings` by the key: `Acquired skills`.

stupo_modules.action: Use module titles/headings/topics for optional keyword matching; cite filenames when referring to modules.

filter_by_language.description: Apply `language_constraint`: english-only → include programs where `language` contains English (or bilingual); german-only → include programs where `language` contains German (or bilingual); either → no filter.

match_keywords.description: Score candidates using `field_interest` keywords against `title`, `acquired_skills` (study_program_webpages.json), and optionally `stupo_modules`.

rank_top3.description: Select top 3 programs by score; break ties by exact language alignment and title/subject matches.

present_table.description: Render a Markdown table for up to 3 programs with fields: `title`, `degree`, `duration`, `language`, `admission`, `url`.

present_comparison_table.description: Render a Markdown table comparing 2–3 selected programs using fields: `title`, `degree`, `duration`, `language`, `admission`, `url`.

summarize_webpage_facts.description: Provide a brief factual summary using `program_overview` and `acquired_skills`.

reference_stupo.description: When discussing modules, reference StuPo filenames from `stupo_modules`.

present_details.description: Show concise details for the selected program including `title`, `degree`, `duration`, `language`, `admission`, `url`.

offer_exit.description: After suggestions or details, offer to exit Program Finder.

phrases.en: Would you like to exit Program Finder?

confirm_reset.description: Ask user to confirm restarting Program Finder.

phrases.en: Do you want to restart Program Finder?
phrases.de: Möchten Sie den Programmfinder neu starten?

clear_state.description: Clear collected slots and transient state.

restart_flow.description: Return to the first question in questions_set (degree_type).

handoff_to_general_help.description: Exit Program Finder and route to general help.

phrases.en: Switching to general TU Berlin help to answer your question.
phrases.de: Wechsel zur allgemeinen TU-Berlin-Hilfe, um Ihre Frage zu beantworten.

program.find.notes: Start Program Finder; ask minimal questions, filter by degree and language, match by interest keywords, and suggest up to three programs.

program.detail.notes: Provide more information for a selected program.

program.compare.notes: Compare 2–3 selected programs side by side using verified facts. Enforce count: 2–3.

program.reset.notes: Clear collected slots and restart Program Finder.

program.exit.notes: Exit Program Finder and hand off to general help.

bachelor_english_only.notes: Inform user about German instruction predominance for Bachelor while still proceeding.

phrases.en: Most TU Berlin Bachelor’s programs are taught in German. If you require English-only, suitable Bachelor options may be limited.
phrases.de: Die meisten Bachelorstudiengänge an der TU Berlin werden auf Deutsch unterrichtet. Wenn Sie ausschließlich Englisch benötigen, sind passende Bacheloroptionen möglicherweise begrenzt.

master_language_requirements.notes: Optionally remind users to check language requirements for enrollment on the official page.

phrases.en: Please check language requirements for enrollment on the official program page.
phrases.de: Bitte beachten Sie die Sprachvoraussetzungen für die Immatrikulation auf der offiziellen Studiengangsseite.
